mapper.insert: insert into WISDOM.SHENGCHANJIHUA (RENWUNO, TOUCHANSHULIANG, JIHUAKAISHIRIQI, JIAOHUOQI) values (#{renwuno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{touchanshuliang,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jihuakaishiriqi,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jiaohuoqi,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select RENWUNO, TOUCHANSHULIANG, JIHUAKAISHIRIQI, JIAOHUOQI from WISDOM.SHENGCHANJIHUA
